data.name: FeetCry : ZombieLand
data.detailed_description:
Importent: This is a Work in Progress Game, not all funktions are programed or finished.


Welcome to my zombie multiplayer game.
One surprise after another awaits you. Because I do what I want... so see for yourself.
Fight alone in a team or with zombies against a wide variety of opponents.
Many updates/patches/DLC will follow

Here are a few keywords:
-Zombies, Boss Zombies, Zombie Animals
-First person, third person
-Zombie zoo with animals
-Different maps with different challenges
- Jetpack Maps


!!!!Game Development still in Progress!!!!
Not all Features are implementet!!

data.short_description: A multiplayer team based zombie shooter, with a special twist everything is possible!!!

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
